title: Un Punto Macrobiotico
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Italian, Macrobiotic, Organic, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. All vegan except for fish some days. Ristorante macrobiotico. Macrobiotic restaurant with simple decor, situated in the city centre near the Vatican. Must join society for food discount. Directions: walk up Via Baldo degli Ubaldi, right on Via U. Moricca. Metro Linea A: Valle Aurelia stop.
